title: The role of tides on the carbon uptake of a coastal polynya in the Weddell Sea
description: In an online flash-presentation, I presented my preliminary results on my tidal work in the Weddell Sea.

title: Trends and emissions of six perfluorocarbons in the Northern and Southern Hemisphere
description: This talk was about the results published in the [Journal of Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics:](https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-20-4787-2020)

title: Long-term trends and emissions of seven perﬂuorocarbon compounds in the Southern and Northern Hemispheres
venue: EGU General Assembly, Austria Center Vienna
description: This talk was about preliminary results, the more processed version of which was published in the [Journal of Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics:](https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-20-4787-2020)
